website_summaries.verdict: A versatile ab stimulator that helps with back and muscle pain in addition to toning abs.
pros: Offers 15 intensity levels that range from warm-up to high-intensity training
Also includes a massage function to aid with back pain
Gel pads can be used up to 30 times
Includes a 100 percent money back guarantee, as well as a one-year warranty
cons: Gel pads can be somewhat difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly noticeable improvements
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient. Very comfortable as well. Good material and durable. Does exactly what I need it to. I can feel it working very clearly after wearing for around 10 minutes! I noticed a change in how defined my abs were after about 2 1/2 weeks of consistent usage. By 1 month, I’ve noticed a good amount of body fat removed from my abdominal region
customer_reviews.author: Jackie white

customer_reviews.title: Great product for exercising
customer_reviews.text: I've never used anything like this before, I'm really happy I did. An easy to read manual, It's really easy to put on, I used this for a week so far, and it's just been one of my favorite items to use before or after a work-out at the gym. I can already feel a difference after a week, it's a great tummy toner.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: It’s my first time using this abdominal belt. I have tried some similar products but it didn’t work well as this and batteries died so quick because it’s not rechargeable and fast charging for only 20 minutes, my belly can feel different after using it.
customer_reviews.author: BeautifulW0rlD

customer_reviews.title: this is the second pad i bought.
customer_reviews.text: i use this when i'm working in the office, and sometimes after workout. because i feel like working in the office didn't move my body a lot, this would help. i use this during the days. and sat sun at the house gym. like it alot. it feel like it excise my muscle in my belly.. it works. because this is the second pad i got, and it have controller.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I like this belt
customer_reviews.text: Frankly speaking I didn't believe it could make me happy for my abdominal fat decreasing.I did tried many way to drop my abdominal fat,but i didn't feel good.After 1 week using this belt I can feel something changed,each time I selected the most powerful level,It made me like exercising,the abs continuous shaking,I do hope I can drop the fat about 3 pounds or more.
customer_reviews.author: Benny Will

customer_reviews.title: Fat go away? Good muscle toner
customer_reviews.text: It's a good toner so far, tried the different modes. Wish the switch is rechargeable as well, I hope to edit this review in the summer when I see the results. I would say I feel the toner...
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Really Help you lose weight
customer_reviews.text: Have had this shengml I was like.it’s fantastic if you want to exercise your muscles or arm leg it’s very good for your baby.when you use for the first time you can feel not comfortable.but then I get used to after twice a week feel much better.use 15-20 mins often my workout or work I was surprised.you simply stick it on your body turn it on.and through electro-magnetic sensors you can feel the shake your muscles. I would definitely recommend this shengml muscle toner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shufanglin

customer_reviews.title: Once it's done, you don't notice it was even on
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for over a week straight on its highest setting. While you're wearing it, you can feel the muscles working. However, you don't notice your muscles being sore the next day. I will likely continue to use it until my sticky pads no longer stick, but won't purchase replacement pads.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Functioning Product But Pads Aren't Sticky After Just One Use
customer_reviews.text: This product does function. It does provide electrical stimulation. Everything was there and it was easy to work. However, the pads did not stay sticky for very long. The quality there is lacking. It would work better if some type of additional elastic band was offered or something. Ultimately, I became annoyed with it and had to wrap it in sports wrap to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: S. Anne

customer_reviews.title: Lazy exercise!
customer_reviews.text: I used this in every morning for my abs and Use other two for my mom's plantar fasciitis. It has been really helpful. After continuous using this for 7 days for 10-15 min my mom's feet shows lots of improvement. She feels more comfortable and her swelling is decreased now. Initially it felt little awkward but after using it for while it shows lots of improvement around my abdomen area. It comes with extra sticky gel pads, USB charging cable and two cells for remote. It is easy to use and has lots of different mode with low to high intensity.
customer_reviews.author: pmk203

customer_reviews.title: Not recommending it
customer_reviews.text: I give this products only 2 stars because I received the products only a little over a month and the first 2 weeks it work ok, I could feel only 2 settings but I was fine with it, then I had to change the sticky pads because they weren’t staying in place and then the little remote stoped sending the signals so I replace the battery with the spare one they sent, still didn’t work so I bought a brand ones and still not working, I’m not sure if it’s the quality of the product or a single issue, but I would NOT recommend it unless they send me a new one that actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Pulido

customer_reviews.title: Ok, I couldn't get it to show a difference
customer_reviews.text: First- I'd like to preface that I don't already have a flat stomach. So for me to see results would be tough since I know it also combines with exercising and eating right. That being said, I did use this on my stomach as directed and I did feel the tiny muscles moving in my stomach. I think if I had done it for hours a day every day, I would have different results, but for now it just is like a mobile tens unit. On the plus side, putting it on low setting can relieve cramps so that's great!
customer_reviews.author: Olive's OpinionsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be cheaply made and size for a extremely petite frame body. The charge on the battery doesn’t last more than 5 minutes on a middle low setting.
customer_reviews.author: Tony DiBlasi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used some similar kind products, but I like this the most. This muscle toner is rechargeable, unlike most others that use batteries, which become weak when batteries die. Will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing strong
customer_reviews.text: I Iove it! I read another reviews saying that it wasn’t strong and I was scared about it but it actually is really strong, even the little ones that you can put in your arms, so it really surprised me. What I love more of this product is that the pads really sticks to your body and it comes with another set of pads for change it. It’s a really easy product to assemble and to use and the instructions in the manual are clear. In the first five minutes of use I started to feel the burning and that’s amazing. I am really happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Luciana

customer_reviews.title: It does the same thing as the professional muscle stimulation device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device as a hobby because in the industry professional muscle stimulation device is booming and I would like to see if this cheap home use device can do the same thing. The concept is that one kind of energy is used to stretch and shrink muscle until its fatigue and therefore trigger muscle growth. At this point the device does stretch and shrink my muscle when applied on my body. I feel a little bit of soreness after 20min of continuous use. I will wait to see if it can do something in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for workouts
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for workouts. Whenever I hit the gym I always wear this product which helps me build muscle quicker and faster. Even though it makes my workouts more challenging it’s all worth it at the end. As said to wear without doing anything won’t be much results in the end. Rather use it while working out
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Dont  Waste your money
customer_reviews.text: After use one time jell don't even stick its Wasting money Mostly time it stop working for no reason You have to wear very tight leggins to hold on on your legs Advice it just fell off
customer_reviews.author: nurten toslu

customer_reviews.title: This belt is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Abs toning belt to help me tone up my body. I like to keep myself fit so try to go to gym regularly. About twice a month. This belt is very easy to use. Has many different settings. I am using it on my torso. I feel my muscles are being stimulated and exercised. There are also patches for arms which I am using as well. I am using this belt every day for a week now. I can see the results already. My stomach getting smaller, my waist getting thinner!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hildebrandt

customer_reviews.title: Pump made easy
customer_reviews.text: Got my abs and core muscles pumped quick, used for only one minute on each spot and that was more than enough to get that pump. Only down side it come with only one gel pad other than that it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Al

customer_reviews.title: Feeling
customer_reviews.text: I experienced it for the first time. I feel a little bit painful but the overall feeling is good. If you have abdominal muscles, I have to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: mingrui kuang

customer_reviews.title: very interesting!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen these muscle toners a lot lately and they're trending. It does take time to assemble correctly to ensure correct use. The feeling is interesting, but it's nice to have muscles stimulated while doing housework to save time. I appreciate the different levels to set, so I could ease into this. Feels great to use this for extra toning!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Fairly decent
customer_reviews.text: After using this for more than a few weeks I can confirm this works. Not too fast, but at a steady pace. I have seen reduction in my waist for sure. I haven't been able to get into the gym as often as I'd like anymore, and this has been a suitable temporary replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ci Ci

customer_reviews.title: It is so cool
customer_reviews.text: I searched anything to burn fat and losing weight for days and one of my frds recommendation is the muscles toners! And I feel like doing a physical therapy at home, building muscle? Not yet, since I been using it for few days, great massage tool? Yeah, definitely.
customer_reviews.author: lizzie. Sn

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I exercise everyday but still feel weak about my abs. So it hurts my back and I always have backache when I do a lot of squats with weights. this one comes with small massager also help to massage my back , my arms, my legs. It fullfilled my expectations. Love it and will recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Really contract the muscles
customer_reviews.text: I did some sessions of EMS in a place, but when I saw that I could do it at home, I got so excited! So I bought it and it is really strong, it’s possible to feel the contractions in the muscles like I felt on the EMS workout. Plus it’s super easy to use and to assemble. I’m using it have 10 days now, can’t wait to start see the results.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are pretty basic. Right out of the box this is an easy product to use. I do wish they would provide more of the backup hydrogel, after the gel conductor pads wear out you'll need to buy new ones. It does give you the feeling of electrical shock at first, which for me was a bit painful. However, as other reviews have stated, you get use to it. No pain, no gain. Time will tell if it tones my abs. I am using it in 15-20 minute increments each day.
customer_reviews.author: WH

customer_reviews.title: It's helpful to stimulate your muscles.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for almost a week. Previously I thought it would not be very useful, but when I used it, I rejected that conclusion. I am a fitness enthusiast, and I spend 1-2 hours in the gym almost every day. I usually use it after working out. It's very useful and I highly recommend it. It has good time control and will stop working at the appointed time. This is a good function. And it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Stimulating...useful muscle stimulator kit!
customer_reviews.text: I and my wife both have never used the muscle stimulator before, we used the stimulator on our abdomen and legs. I adjusted it to the third level, After using it for half an hour every day, I felt a pain in my abdomen, this proves that it works. The protective films are still very sticky after multiple uses, At first, I was afraid it wouldn't take long. The experience was very positive for my wife too. To be honest, I am very satisfied with the product, I wish I got it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Deloris Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Fatty be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with my toner!! I sit and watch TV or when I'm getting ready in the morning have it on. I work my abs out on the reg but this gives me a little extra kick. I would highly recommend this for someone who wants to kick start the ab muscles. I use this on my thighs as well. I do workout at least 5 times a week and my results are starting to show.
customer_reviews.author: gamisou60

customer_reviews.title: Two of my Fitness apparatus dont work
customer_reviews.text: I would have given more starts but two of my Fitness apparatus doest work i tried charging it but the only thing it does is turn on the light but when i try to use it doesnt turn on what so ever so that means i only have one Fitness apparatus than am able to use at a time which its pointless also i tried to get more gel pad but they didnt have any place i could get new ones (i followed the question and answer response to get some but could find them) so i bought so other ones but they are not to long enough and the conductivity is not good enough
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Bailon

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this product after reading all of the great reviews. I followed the VERY poorly written directions to the best of my ability and set everything up. Just by looking at the quality of the product alone, I am not surprised it did not work. The remote did not work at all, even after charging them for 2+ hours. Don't be like me and get this cheaply made product, you're better off saving up some money to buy a nicer one that you can depend on actually working. Immediately I had to return the product, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: hk

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: They shut off after only a few seconds without use which is very annoying. I get a prick sometimes from the arm bands, which is also annoying. But they work. I wish I had sunk more money into a better model, or a different unit altogether, but hey, you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Cool

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: got this couple days ago for my belly, works good,I think the ABS gel pad has less power than the body fit gel pad, the body fit pad have more feeling or simulator , my neck pain I try to test if it works, it does work for me
customer_reviews.author: kennydj

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Use this as an assistant exercise. Keep using it at least a week and also do the regular exercise, you will see the effect. The buckle is a little bit too tight to attach, just use tools to fit it a little bit. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: ISABELLA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tech
customer_reviews.text: I have used this kit form a month. I can feel I am losing fat. Awesome technology!
customer_reviews.author: pjiang

customer_reviews.title: Arbeitet sehr gut
customer_reviews.text: The device does its job and adheres well to all parts of the body. Very safe packed and fast delivery. What I also find great, is that the parts are charged with the usb and therefore no batteries needed. After two days of use, I have now taken a day off because I already have sore muscles. I will definitely continue to use it and look forward to the results. I would recommend washing the part where you put the pad on before using it. Others said they felt the pads loose, but I did not experience them myself, and when they come off you always have the extra gel pads.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Kampmann

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. On low settings didnt even feel like it was working on setting 2 it was so intense it hurt. The adhesive pads only stuck 1 time and they didnt even stay in place that well. Machine kept turning off during use. Will never purchase again. Actually threw mine away it was so awful.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Z

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these before, but it chewed through batteries. Having rechargeable batteries in the units makes such a huge difference. It felt a bit under-powered at first, but as soon as I changed the mode I was able to feel pretty strong muscle contraction
customer_reviews.author: dark eegan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It didnt work, I'm guess it was broke when it was sent it to me. Very cheap, what a wasted. I returned it and they still charged me. I will say dont not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: charne

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It stimulates the part of muscles that you want to train. I haven't seen my 6-pack yet but seems like the muscles are tighter than before.
customer_reviews.author: Marvellux

customer_reviews.title: Lose fat
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for burn fat and tone muscle, first time use was very uncomfortable, after that it works great .
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: If you want to tone your belly, you have to try this! You obviously will still have to work out but this will definitely help you! And you could use it not only for your belly but also for any other area you would like to tone up! How awesome is that?!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: There are a few reasons why I like this. One, it's cordless. I can put them on and put my shirt over it. The remote can adjust intensity and type of pulse. So I get it to where I like it, and do other stuff. Two, you can charge all three units all at once with the USB chord and they last a long time on one charge. Finally, the orientation of the pads is good. The spacing is right and it is convenient. I can notice an improvement in my muscle tone with just a couple weeks use.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: shaking
customer_reviews.text: I used it for several days and I can feel the fat shaking in my body. There are different modes that can help me to know which one is better for my shape. The quality so far is good and I hope I can get fat lost in months. I like this product. Waiting for effects!
customer_reviews.author: JLLY

customer_reviews.title: I have absolutely no regrets about this price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad To find this and buy it. Lately, I think I'm very weak and need some light training to get used to it. I believe it's very useful for my body because I can feel the abdominal stimulator working! Easy to use, easy to do regular exercise. To avoid unpleasant feelings, it is necessary to increase power bit by bit to allow the body to adapt. One advantage: Ship quickly. I have absolutely no regrets about this price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Jacobi

customer_reviews.title: Strong, hopefully  effective!
customer_reviews.text: If you said this thing is weak, you clearly are not using it right. After 3 days using it twice a day with it on until it hurts, I'm as sore from it as a 20 minute ab work out! It has to be working, but only time will tell. I work out hard too, but I believe this should help even more. Will update soon...
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Sticker of gel is nice but doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work for me. The gel stickers don't last 3 times using it. The belt works only for 2 minutes and later resetting.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: simple
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time to try this product, I feel very comfortable, the operation method is very simple, very good product
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: New toy for body
customer_reviews.text: Always want to try this so finally buy one. Was exciting when I received it, easy to use and pretty cool looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Monstar

customer_reviews.title: Tight abs!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for 2 weeks and my abdomen is definitely tight! I love that you can charge with the usb cable and you don’t need batteries. The video shows you can definitely feel it working
customer_reviews.author: Marina Lobo

customer_reviews.title: Fat feel warm when using it
customer_reviews.text: After thinking a long time I finally chose this one because most of its reviews are good. My fat gets warm when i was using it, but sometimes I am not sure the power is on or off since i cant see the light blink or something.hope that I can get the muscle as i want ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Harris

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I buy it for 6 month now!i work part-time and i'm a mom so i decided to get this and it seems to be doing the trick. I've had it for a couple of months and I put it on when doing chores or while doing housework. You can feel the stimulator doing the job and the electric waves don't hurt. It's also very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: bessie mavis

customer_reviews.title: Its okay.  I can tell the product is kinda cheap since its from China.
customer_reviews.text: I can definitely feel the elelctro magnetic contractions when i first used it. But sInce there are different intensity levels, i used it on level 3 for the first time. But the more i use it I feel like the power is getting worse every time i use it. i was already little skeptical about the longevity of this product..
customer_reviews.author: kevin kwak

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: First set stopped working properly shortly after using using a couple of weeks. Got a replacement, and it was defective out of the box. Two of the devices simply didn’t work. These devices do work for toning. Just don’t bother with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: harleyd317

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Mine came without the directions. Also, the charger leeds will not stay connected or stay powered on at the place it connects to the device, so I can’t charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. I felt nothing. Charged it more than 24 hours. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this item! With all the research of the benefits of this product I knew this would be a good invest. But to my dismay when my package arrived it was opened as if it had been used. When I ordered it was suppose to be new. Not something you want to buy used as you have to put the gel pads on your skin. I would think twice to make this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Worthy!
customer_reviews.text: After using for three days, I can feel the difference, nice product.

customer_reviews.title: I would live to return it
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Not working and very hard to keep it on

customer_reviews.title: So good

customer_reviews.text: The stickiness is pretty bad and doesn't stick all that well to the skin. Overall it is decent at best.

customer_reviews.title: Broke a day later. And I only used it once
customer_reviews.text: It was all great until a day later the half of it just stopped working so I would repurchase or gift it. Quality sucks
customer_reviews.author: Rae Perez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I use it after running and abdominal muscle training, I don’t know how it works but I feel like it tight a little after use it. I can only take level 4 at beginning, hope it helps!

customer_reviews.title: Useful and effective
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and effective. Good for gym and daily muscle relaxation. Easy to use and clean.

customer_reviews.title: Muscle toning belt
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and it works. Simply put it on your body and let the belt do the work. Ido this while working at the office because I don't have time to go to a gym. So far it works reducing fat.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The EMS devices are designed well and simple to use. The pads are sticking to skin well and they don’t cause any skin reaction or itchy feeling . Would recommend this product to anyone who doesn't have the time to do a workout at the gym first thing in morning or after work.
customer_reviews.author: JESSIE HAIGLER

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install fast charge and it can keep 15mins each set Different speed can choice Got this for my husband and he use this a lot after gym, he loves it. Highly recommend this produce.

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after the first ~3 months
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for the first ~3months then the product stops working. Thought it was due to not being charged...but after placing it to charge for a full day, still didn’t work.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for reminder
customer_reviews.text: This can help you shape your body a little bit. But it keeps remind you that you have to use it everyday and you will keep doing exercise everyday. You have to put the system on everyday. When you put them on, you will realize you need to do some work out and get shape. It is more like a clock to remind you to do work out which is a great thing.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised after using this abdominal belt,I can feel there are a lot different.The batteries can last long time and it can be rechargeable and fast charging for around 20 minutes,It works so well.I will keep using it in order to get more effect.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simple, did not work and was extremely confusing to learn how to use. I would give it 0 stars if I could. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Burning me
customer_reviews.text: So this product keeps shocking me. Like not the way it's supposed to its leaving burn Mark's on my skin and it is painful.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. This product doesn’t work. I charged the the accessible pieces and put battery in controller nothing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Jai Nicole

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. It hurts really badly and it doesn't work. I would NEVER buy this product again.

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Leads aren't staying on put it on me for the first time seem to be very cheap I am returning it getting a different brand all together

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work but got it sent back and my refund very fast, very professional. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: James cline

customer_reviews.title: Not enough sticker things
customer_reviews.text: It's not strong enough and doesn't stay on long. I don't like the clicker making noisey when trying to get higher pulse
customer_reviews.author: Paula Walker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Snaps are strong and won't come off. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Waste money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly waist money does stay charged long and zero change.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not the best value
customer_reviews.text: Not enough stimulation. I have a 10 year old "Slendertone" that can make you jump off the couch. This is so weak I have to think about whether it's on or off
customer_reviews.author: rick todd

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: So I got this in the mail today, unpacked it and wanted to get it ready for use. Turns out the snaps each controller has in the back to attach to the units don't fit. I've tried to push them in with heavy pressure - nothing. I don't know how this flawed design is working out for others? Tells me a lot about the company and the overall quality of the product. Immediate return.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: unsanitary
customer_reviews.text: when i received the product, i was disappointed bc i got an open item meaning somebody used it...its unsanitary to send a used product...
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Guys. This is stupid. It doesn’t work. Just go to the gym. I was stupid and believed the hype and wasted 50 bucks. Don’t be like me.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

product_meta.title: SHENGMI Muscle Toner, Abdominal Toning Belt Abs Trainer Body Fitness Belt Ab Workout Machine for Men & Women Arm & Leg Trainer
product_meta.description:
Best gift for men and women!
If you want to get the"legendary muscles"you see in the magazines,you need the dalemy EMS Abdominal Muscle Abs Trainer belts!
What's an EMS Training! Generally, muscles act in response to signals from the brain.
EMSis a technology that uses electrical signals to directly stimulate and exercise the muscles.
Training gear to wear,More strongly, to the beautiful body. Pad to train the waist, arms, legs.


Product Features:
Size: Big one: 21 * 17 cm
Small one: 20 * 7.2 cm
Main Material Body: PET resin gel
Pad: Polyacrylamide
Glycerin Remote: ABS resin
EMS devices: Rechargeable
Power source Input: 100-240V,50/60Hz?
Adopting EMS technology, EMS , which builds muscles through the skin, it is recognized as an effective method of training muscles.
Ab belts for abdomen Training, for arm/leg and specific body area exercise or massage. promote muscle movement.Let you have a perfect curve.
Wireless remote control Achieving operation without clicking on the machine, just a tiny wireless remote control is enough.
Contact the skin patch with our soft PU material to ensure a comfortable workout.
It's light and portable.You can do muscle trainning in office, bedroom, or any place you want. Not just in gym.
Please noted:
The gel pad is only the replacement of Abdominal Muscles Toner, it can not be used without controller.
The gel pads are consumable,When you peel the gel pad off your body for about 20~30 times, you need change new gel pads.please buy from us this transparent gel pads.
Especially suitable for:
★1. Sports lovers
★2.People with a Sore Back
★3.Fitness Enthusiasts already in good shape
★4.Executives who don't have time to get to the gym
★5.Post-partum and more
feature_bullets: ★【What's an EMS machine?】 -- EMS through current, directly send signal to muscles, and promote muscle movement. All you have to do is to fit the pads to your body and let them exercise your muscles.

★ 【What's it for?】 -- It's for muscle training and body slimming. This muscle toner can help to tone, tighten and strenghten your body muscles, you can gain a better figure after consecutive use this product for about 2 months.

★ 【How long should I use it?】 -- About 20 minutes(10mins low level, 5mins medium level, 5mins high level). There are 10 modes（1*Automatic mode + 9*Manual mode） and 20 levels of intensity optional to help fat burning and muscle growing.It equals to 2000M running, 60 minutes of sit-ups, 60 minutes of free swimming,2 weeks of diet.

★【When should I use it?】 -- You can use this EMS ab trainer anytime, anywhere. It's super light, ultra thin, WEARABLE, and convenient to carry. Body Fit Pad can be worn unobtrusively under your clothes, making it ideal for muscle training while reading, watching a movie or doing housework, or even during business or leisure trips.
★【Package Includes】Fitness Machine *3 + ABS Gel Pad *1 + Body fit Gel Pad *2 + Remote Control *1 + Storage belt *1 + USB Line *1 + Bottom Plate*3 + English Instruction Manual *1
